column1: Little Goat Diner////What a food experience!!! Oh my. Tonight went to little goat with a private group. We used the private room upstairs with the open kitchen and terrace. The atmosphere is so quaint and cozy - we loved it! But nothing could have prepared us for the culinary journey we were about to embark on. We tasted flavors pairings we could never have imagined. Tarragon butter
column7: all topped off with chocolate pavlova for dessert. Every bite was an explosion of flavor. My review can't do it justice
column8: you'll have to try for yourself. You won't be sorry! Yum!
